message.content:
I need to find the specific line items and value of costs for general management and administration from this income statement.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole would be "Administrative Expenses".

In the given income statement, the value for Administrative Expenses is 16566.53 on 2024-02-04.

This is the equivalent of what was identified in the example (Administrative Expenses = 1425164.20).

```json
{"solution": {'value': '16566.53'} }
```
